content: The IPS track kickoff session for Connectathon 29 has been scheduled for Monday Jan 10 from 2:00 - 3:00 PM CST. I expect that the session should be showing up in Whova shortly.
Hi, everyone. Our kickoff session is at 2:00 PM CST (20:00 UTC) today and is on Whova here. Weâ€™re looking forward to what we'll be able to accomplish for IPS over the next 2 days!

Thanks Rob for a great kickoff! For those interested to discuss IPS workflow, we'll be on a call tomorrow @9am CT (10am ET) and that Zoom link is on the IPS Track page (https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=81004083)...if you'd like an invite for calendar, just DM me.

In terms of leading a discussion on Must Support within IPS, we've been working on that. I shared a presentation regarding a few weeks ago (https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1hopNZWY57AUB7qlpmSinrCiTHtmtkELgZJVjL5-jE_g/edit#slide=id.p). I would propose setting up time tomorrow afternoon (1pm or 3pm CT)

For those interested to join the 9am CT (10am ET) discussion around IPS workflow that will include feedback from a 2021 prototype of IPS developed by NHS in the UK as well as some discussion from Patient Centric Solutions (US), please join us. If you have any trouble accessing the meeting, just reach out to me directly. If you have 12 minutes and want to watch the UK demo in advance, here's that link: https://vimeo.com/653713828
